item.title: Hello World
item.description: You need to start somewhere. Our first years learn to make pixel art, to create 2d sprite and skeletal animations, to make 3D models,and to begin learning to code in C#. Most of all, our students learn to make games, by making games. using System; class Program { static void Main() { Console.WriteLine("Hello, World!"); } }
